abstract: NFL Roundup; Chicago Bears linebacker Lance Briggs says that he plans to retire soon; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: Lance Briggs, a seven-time Pro Bowl linebacker who helped Chicago reach the Super Bowl after the 2006 season, said he was ready to end his career.

headline.main: Bears’ Briggs Says He’s Near Retirement
headline.print_headline: Briggs Says He’s Ready to End His Career

snippet: Lance Briggs, a seven-time Pro Bowl linebacker who helped Chicago reach the Super Bowl after the 2006 season, said he was ready to end his career.
